data.name: txtRefreshWebDataInterval.ToolTip
data.value:
Specify how ofter data should be sent to web server
Note that data actualy could be sent only at multiples of Refresh interval setting (so if your "Refresh interval" set at 60 sec, and "Send data" at 75 sec, actualy data would be sent every 120 sec)

data.name: txtRefreshInterval.ToolTip
data.value: Data refresh interval in milleseconds. Every refresh cycle program analyse buffer with receieved serial data and then newest sensor data is stored to data files and output to form, charts refresh and all needed data sent to internet. Generally it should be equal or greater then Arduino sensor measurement cycle (can me measured manually watching serial log output)

data.name: txtWSpeedZero.ToolTip
data.value:
Calibrating wind speed zero speed value
To measure it, stop wind sensor rotation and look for [WnV] value in Serial Log Window. Note, that it can't be 0. If it is 0, then something wrong with the sensor
Default value (suits for my conditions) 83 units

data.name: txtK1.ToolTip
txtK2.ToolTip

txtK3.ToolTip
txtK6.ToolTip
txtK4.ToolTip
txtK5.ToolTip
txtWetLimit.ToolTip
data.value:
Wet threshold limit. All values higher then this will be treated as a dry condition
IMPORTANT. Because when Boltwood Rain Condition is signaling "Wet", software like CCDAutopilot or CCDCommander could stop imaging run, "Wet" signal is never set up during Sky Clear condition (remains "Dry").

data.name: txtCSDecreasingMaxDelta.ToolTip
data.value:
Very advanced settings :) Do not change it untill you know what you are doing
Program determines when Cloud Sensor need heating based on some conditions: - CS value is in "CS threshold switching on" interval (see above) - average CS value for every 5 minutes are decreasing and the decriments are in "CS decreasing thershold" interval - Since previous heating passed more "Heater pause time" seconds - There is no rain now - There is 100% humidity - It is dark now

data.name: txtCSDecreasingMinDelta.ToolTip
data.value:
Very advanced settings :) Do not change it untill you know what you are doing
Program determines when Cloud Sensor need heating based on some conditions: - CS value is in "CS threshold switching on" interval (see above) - average CS value for every 5 minutes are decreasing and the decriments are in "CS decreasing thershold" interval - Since previous heating passed more "Heater pause time" seconds - There is no rain now - There is 100% humidity - It is dark now
